trans-unit.source: Provides attributes for files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 提供檔案和目錄的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can get attributes for files and directories by calling the <xref:System.IO.File.GetAttributes%2A> method, and you can set them by calling the <xref:System.IO.File.SetAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由呼叫檔案和目錄取得屬性<xref:System.IO.File.GetAttributes%2A>方法，而且您可以設定它們藉由呼叫<xref:System.IO.File.SetAttributes%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.File.SetAttributes%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.GetAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to change the compression status of a <xref:System.IO.File> object by using the <xref:System.IO.File.SetAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 不可能變更的壓縮狀態<xref:System.IO.File>物件使用<xref:System.IO.File.SetAttributes%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.File.SetAttributes%2A> </xref:System.IO.File>

trans-unit.source: Instead, you must actually compress the file using either a compression tool or one of the classes in the <xref:System.IO.Compression?displayProperty=fullName> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您必須實際壓縮檔案使用的壓縮工具或其中一個類別中<xref:System.IO.Compression?displayProperty=fullName>命名空間。</xref:System.IO.Compression?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The file is a candidate for backup or removal.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的備份或移除的候選項目。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The file is compressed.
To be added.
Reserved for future use.
To be added.
The file is a directory.
To be added.
The file or directory is encrypted.
For a file, this means that all data in the file is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 對於檔案，這表示檔案中的所有資料會都加密。

trans-unit.source: For a directory, this means that encryption is the default for newly created files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 對於目錄而言，這表示加密是新建立的檔案和目錄的預設值。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The file is hidden, and thus is not included in an ordinary directory listing.
trans-unit.target: 檔案隱藏，因此不會包含在一般的目錄清單。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The file or directory includes data integrity support.
trans-unit.target: 檔案或目錄包含資料完整性支援。

trans-unit.source: When this value is applied to a file, all data streams in the file have integrity support.
trans-unit.target: 當這個值套用至檔案時，檔案中的所有資料流，都有完整性支援。

trans-unit.source: When this value is applied to a directory, all new files and subdirectories within that directory, by default, include integrity support.
trans-unit.target: 當這個值套用至目錄時，所有新的檔案和子目錄中該目錄中，依預設，包含完整性支援。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The file is a standard file that has no special attributes.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何特殊屬性的標準檔案的檔案。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is valid only if it is used alone.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是單獨使用時才有效。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The file or directory is excluded from the data integrity scan.
trans-unit.target: 從資料完整性掃描排除檔案或目錄。

trans-unit.source: When this value is applied to a directory, by default, all new files and subdirectories within that directory are excluded from data integrity.
trans-unit.target: 當這個值套用至目錄，根據預設，所有新的檔案和子目錄的目錄中會排除資料完整性。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The file will not be indexed by the operating system's content indexing service.
trans-unit.target: 檔案將不會編製索引服務的電腦系統的內容。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The file is offline.
The data of the file is not immediately available.
trans-unit.target: 無法立即使用檔案資料。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The file is read-only.
To be added.
The file contains a reparse point, which is a block of user-defined data associated with a file or a directory.
trans-unit.target: 此檔案包含重新分析點，也就是檔案或目錄相關聯的使用者定義資料區塊。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The file is a sparse file.
Sparse files are typically large files whose data consists of mostly zeros.
trans-unit.target: 疏鬆檔案是通常大型的檔案，其中的資料組成幾乎為零值。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The file is a system file.
That is, the file is part of the operating system or is used exclusively by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，檔案是作業系統的一部分，或作業系統所獨佔使用。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The file is temporary.
A temporary file contains data that is needed while an application is executing but is not needed after the application is finished.
trans-unit.target: 暫存檔案包含應用程式正在執行，但是不需要在應用程式完成之後需要的資料。

trans-unit.source: File systems try to keep all the data in memory for quicker access rather than flushing the data back to mass storage.
trans-unit.target: 檔案系統會嘗試讓所有大型存放回更快速存取，而不要清除資料的記憶體中的資料。

trans-unit.source: A temporary file should be deleted by the application as soon as it is no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式應該刪除暫存檔案，只要不再需要。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
